Class AbstractState

java.lang.Object
  environnement.AbstractState
All Implemented Interfaces:
State, Serializable, Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Contraction, MaabacState
public abstract class AbstractState
extends Object
implements State

Wrapping Interface State and define some common behaviors.

Version:
$Revision: 1.0 $
Author:
Francesco De Comite (decomite at lifl.fr)
